ModMetaData.name: Blocky Signs
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description: Blocky Signs Sign Stuffable signs that can display a custom text with a custom color. Sign width is automagically adjusted to accomodate contents. Font size & other options changeable in mod settings. Wall Sign Same as regular one, but you can stick it to any surface. Frames You can build a beautiful museum (Things shown are from Fantastic Collectables mod) Frames have their own beauty and quality that. Additional beauty from displayed item is calculated as maximum of its own beauty or monetary value x0.25. Or a scary room of fear: If [b]Ideology[/b] is active you can put a skull or a small dead animal into a frame, and it will induce terror. Just like the vanilla skullspike, but better. Or just put them on top of your favorite pawn's dresser: Small frames fit perfectly on top of dressers and bed tables. All frames act like a standard containers, but can hold just a single item. Use Flickable Storage if you want to lock items within frames. Verified compatible/supported mods • LWM's Deep Storage • Bill Doors' Framework https://github.com/zed-0xff/RW-BlockySigns Support me https://ko-fi.com/K3K81Z3W5 or https://www.patreon.com/zed_0xff
